perturbation.original_text: Detto shall comply with all laws and regulations applicable to Detto's marketing and distribution of Qwik-Fix Pro hereunder. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Detto shall, at its own expense, make, obtain, and maintain in force at all times during the term of this Agreement, all filings, registrations, licenses, permits and authorizations in North America required for Detto to perform its obligations under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Detto shall make reasonable efforts to comply with laws and regulations applicable to Detto's marketing and distribution of Qwik-Fix Pro hereunder. Detto shall make reasonable efforts to maintain filings, registrations, licenses, permits and authorizations in North America required for Detto to perform its obligations under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause mandates full compliance with all applicable laws. By changing 'shall comply' to 'shall make reasonable efforts to comply,' the contract weakens Detto's obligation to adhere to legal requirements. This creates a potential loophole where Detto could argue that it made efforts but failed to fully comply, potentially violating consumer protection laws related to marketing and distribution in North America. The phrase 'at its own expense' is also removed, potentially shifting financial burdens related to legal compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various consumer protection laws and regulations related to marketing and distribution in North America.

perturbation.original_text: Detto covenants that it will (a) provide its customers with first quality sales and technical support with respect to any copies or licenses of Qwik-Fix Pro sold by Detto, (b) promptly, courteously and appropriately respond to its customers questions, concerns and complaints, and (c) generally deal with its customers in a professional manner that shall add to the good reputation of Detto and PivX. To the extent that Detto fails to fulfill its contractual and legal obligations to its customers, Detto agrees that PivX may elect to fulfill those obligations, or any portion of them, and Detto shall reimburse PivX any costs and expenses so incurred by PivX. Detto agrees to indemnify and hold PivX harmless in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.4 to the extent that it breaches any of its covenants under this Section 2.8.
perturbation.changed_text: Detto covenants that it will (a) provide its customers with sales and technical support with respect to any copies or licenses of Qwik-Fix Pro sold by Detto, (b) respond to its customers questions, concerns and complaints, and (c) generally deal with its customers. To the extent that Detto fails to fulfill its contractual obligations to its customers, Detto agrees that PivX may elect to fulfill those obligations, or any portion of them, and Detto shall reimburse PivX any costs and expenses so incurred by PivX. Detto agrees to indemnify and hold PivX harmless in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.4 to the extent that it breaches any of its covenants under this Section 2.8.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'first quality', 'promptly, courteously and appropriately', and 'in a professional manner that shall add to the good reputation of Detto and PivX' weakens the standard of customer service Detto is obligated to provide. Also, removing 'legal' weakens the obligation. This could violate implied warranty laws that require a certain level of service and support. Removing these qualifiers introduces ambiguity and lowers consumer protection standards.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied warranty laws and consumer protection laws related to acceptable standards of customer service.

perturbation.original_text: PivX warrants that Qwik-Fix Pro will substantially conform to the user documentation. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH ABOVE, QWIK-FIX PRO AND DOCUMENTATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS". PIVX HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.changed_text: EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH ABOVE, QWIK-FIX PRO AND DOCUMENTATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS". PIVX HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'PivX warrants that Qwik-Fix Pro will substantially conform to the user documentation' and 'INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE' entirely eliminates the already-limited product warranty. This violates consumer protection laws which often imply a warranty of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose, ensuring the product functions as intended and is suitable for its marketed use. By omitting this, the agreement provides even weaker protection.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied Warranty of Merchantability, Implied Warranty of Fitness for a Particular Purpose, and other related consumer protection laws.
